sn54.2:1.1: “Anapanassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn54.2:1.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, anapanassati katham bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa?
sn54.2:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anapanassatisahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
sn54.2:1.5: anapanassatisahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn54.2:1.6: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, anapanassati evam bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa”ti.
